00016 #define ERROR_TOKEN "ERROR: "
00017 
00018 #define STACK_FRAMES 30
00019 
00020 #define STACK_START "*** start stack ***\n"
00021 #define STACK_EOF   "\n*** eof stack ***\n\n"
00022 
00023 
00024 static int FD_OUT  = 2;
00025 static int FD_ASSIGNED = 0;
00026 
00027 #ifdef __linux__
00028 static void dump_modules();
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 int errorp_open_file(const char *file)
00032 {
00033   int fd;
00034 
00035   fd = open( file , O_CREAT | O_RDWR, S_IWUSR  | S_IRUSR );
00036   if (fd != -1) {
00037     FD_OUT = fd;
00038     FD_ASSIGNED = 1;
00039   }
00040   return fd;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void errorp_close_file()
00044 {
00045   if (FD_ASSIGNED != 1) {
00046     close( FD_OUT );
00047     FD_OUT = 2;
00048     FD_ASSIGNED = 0;
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void errorp(int rval, const char *fmt, ... ) 
00053 {
00054   char buff[ 1024 ];
00055   char *p, *eof;
00056   va_list ap;
00057   int len, n;
00058  
00059 #if __linux__
00060   void *sframes[ STACK_FRAMES + 1 ];
00061   int nframes, i;
00062 #endif
00063 
00064   p = buff;
00065   eof = p + sizeof( buff );
00066 
00067   strcpy( p, ERROR_TOKEN );
00068   p += strlen( ERROR_TOKEN );
00069 
00070 
00071   va_start( ap, fmt );
00072   len =  vsnprintf( p, eof - p - 1, fmt, ap );
00073   va_end( ap );
00074   p += len;
00075 
00076   n = snprintf(p, eof - p - 1, ". returns %d errno %d\n", rval, errno );
00077   p += n;
00078    
00079   write( FD_OUT , buff , p - buff );
00080 
00081 #if __linux__
00082   nframes = backtrace( sframes, STACK_FRAMES + 1); \
00083   write( FD_OUT, STACK_START, strlen( STACK_START ) );
00084   
00085   nframes =  backtrace( sframes, STACK_FRAMES );
00086   for (i=0; i<nframes; i++) {
00087     snprintf( buff, sizeof(buff),  "frame %d ip: %p\n", i, sframes[ i ]);
00088     write( FD_OUT , buff, strlen( buff ) );
00089   }
00090 
00091   dump_modules();
00092   write( FD_OUT, STACK_EOF, strlen( STACK_EOF ) );
00093 #endif
00094 }
00095 
00096 #define TOKENS_COUNT        6
00097 #define TOKENS_ADDRESS      0
00098 #define TOKENS_PERMISSIONS  1 
00099 #define TOKENS_FILEOFFSET   2
00100 #define TOKENS_PATH         5
00101 
00102 #ifdef __linux__
00103 void dump_modules()
00104 {
00105   int fd, n, i, buf_start;
00106   char buf[ 1024 ], line[30];
00107   char *pos, *eof_line, *tokens[ TOKENS_COUNT ];
00108 
00109   sprintf(buf,"/proc/%d/maps", getpid() );
00110 
00111 
00112   fd = open( buf, O_RDONLY );
00113   if (fd == -1) {
00114     return;
00115   }
00116   
00117   buf_start = 0;
00118   while(1) {
00119     n = read(fd, buf + buf_start, sizeof(buf) - buf_start );
00120     if (n <= 0) {
00121       break;
00122     }
00123 
00124     pos = buf;
00125     while(1) {
00126 
00127        eof_line = memchr( pos, '\n', buf + sizeof(buf) - pos );
00128        if (eof_line == 0) {
00129          break;
00130        }
00131        
00132        *eof_line = '\0';
00133        for(i=0; i< TOKENS_COUNT; i++) {
00134          tokens[ i ] = strtok( !i ? pos : 0," ");
00135          if (! tokens[ i ]) {
00136            break;
00137          }
00138          if (i == TOKENS_PERMISSIONS) {
00139            if (strchr( tokens[i], 'x') == 0) {
00140              break;
00141            }
00142          }
00143        }
00144        if (i == TOKENS_COUNT) {
00145           snprintf(line, sizeof(line) - 1, "\n%s %s ", tokens[ TOKENS_ADDRESS ] , tokens[ TOKENS_FILEOFFSET ]);
00146           write( FD_OUT, line, strlen(line) );
00147           write( FD_OUT, tokens[ TOKENS_PATH ], strlen( tokens[ TOKENS_PATH ] ) );
00148        
00149        }
00150       
00151        pos = eof_line + 1;
00152     }
00153 
00154     buf_start = 0;
00155     if (pos < (buf + sizeof(buf) - 1)) {
00156       buf_start = buf + sizeof(buf) - pos;
00157       memmove( buf, pos, buf_start ); 
00158     }
00159   }
00160   close(fd);
00161 
00162 }
00163 #endif
